title: Affordable Art Fair
seo_title: Affordable Art Fair | WestHouse Hotel New York
contents: The Affordable Art Fair is in town, showcasing works from more than 1,000 artists at Chelsea’s Metropolitan Pavilion. Pieces at mega fairs like Frieze and Art Basel come from art-world superstars and can fetch millions. Art at this New York fair, however, sells for a more manageable maximum of $10,000.
preview: The Affordable Art Fair is in town, showcasing works from more than 1,000 artists at Chelsea’s Metropolitan Pavilion.
